mention.text: the country following the death of one noncommissioned officer and six soldiers on 23 february as a result of guerrilla attacks in five antioquia department municipalities , the kidnapping of a mayor , a government official , and a candidate in cauca department , and the death of a guerrilla in guaviare

six soldiers on 23 february as a result of guerrilla attacks in five antioquia department municipalities , the kidnapping of a mayor , a government official , and a candidate in cauca department , and the death of a guerrilla in guaviare
